tool_description: Manages and retrieves standard legal clauses from the clause library based on contract requirements and jurisdiction.

contract_type.description: Type of contract for which clauses are needed

clause_categories.description: Specific categories of clauses to retrieve

risk_profile.description: Risk tolerance level: conservative, balanced, aggressive

error_messages: Invalid contract type: Specify a recognized contract type for clause retrieval.
Unsupported jurisdiction: The jurisdiction is not supported in the clause library.
Invalid risk profile: Use conservative, balanced, or aggressive.
No clauses available: No clauses found matching the specified criteria.
usage: Provide contract_type and jurisdiction. Optionally specify clause_categories and risk_profile for targeted results. Returns available clauses with metadata.

clause_descriptions.description: Descriptions of what each clause covers

mandatory_status.description: Whether each clause is mandatory for the jurisdiction

risk_levels.description: Risk level associated with each clause
